correction_response: This tweet is accurate in stating that gun violence has had a significant impact on American children, with the U.S. having a higher rate of firearm-related deaths among children compared to other high-income countries (https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/00046149.htm). However, the claim that gun violence is the leading cause of death for American children may be misleading without specific recent data to support it. The tweet is correct in highlighting the need for stronger gun laws, a sentiment echoed by President Biden on the 10th anniversary of the Sandy Hook tragedy (https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-owes-sandy-hook-families-stronger-gun-laws-biden-says-2022-12-14/).
